main event: A UFO sighting report from Vandalia, Ohio on 4 September 1956.
interesting points: The object was reported to be the size of a pea and was described as remaining still in the air., The sighting lasted for 20 minutes., The source of the sighting was civilian., The sighting was suggested to be caused by a reflection of Mars., Additional reports of a UFO sighting were received from a resident of Dayton, Ohio later that evening.
sighted object: one object approximately the size of a pea
witness description: Civilian observer who reported the sighting
